snippet: The Rev. Louie Giglio, who has been chosen to deliver the benediction at President Obama’s second inauguration, is being criticized for an antigay sermon.
abstract: Rev Louie Giglio, who has been chosen to deliver benediction at President Obama’s second inauguration, is being criticized for antigay sermon he delivered in 1990s.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Louie Giglio, who has been chosen to deliver the benediction at President Obama’s second inauguration, is being criticized for an antigay sermon.

headline.seo: Louie Giglio, Inaugural Pastor, Criticized for Antigay Sermon
headline.main: Pastor Chosen for Inaugural Was Criticized as Antigay
headline.print_headline: Pastor Chosen for Inaugural Was Criticized as Antigay
